member.summary: Returns the Spearman's Rank Coefficients for all combinations of pairs of columns

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.PMCCToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Returns the Product Moment Correlation Coefficients for all combinations of pairs of columns

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.SummaryStatisticsToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Returns the mean and variance of all columns

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.MultipleLinearToolStripMenuItem1_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Returns the summary of a Multiple Linear Regression on a dataset, based on one column as the dependent variable

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.SingleLinearToolStripMenuItem2_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Returns the summary of a Linear Regression on a dataset, based on two columns, one as the independent and one as the dependent variable

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.MultiplicativeToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Returns the summary of a Multiplicative Regression on a dataset, based on two columns, one as the independent and one as the dependent variable

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.PolynomialToolStripMenuItem2_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Returns the summary of a Polynomial Regression on a dataset, based on two columns, one as the independent and one as the dependent variable

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.AutomaticAnalysisToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Performs an Automatic Regression on a dataset, with based on one column as the dependent

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.LoadNewProjectToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Exits back to main menu, closing the analysis

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.ExitProgramToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Exits the program completely

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.RegressionFormClosing(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the closing of the analysis form

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.LinearSearchToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Searches the dataset for linear dependence Linear dependence is when one column can be expressed as the sum of a multiple of any combination of columns

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.MultiplicativeSearchToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Searches the dataset for multiplicative dependence Multiplicative dependence is when one column can be expressed as the product of powers of any combination of columns

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.SaveAnalysisData(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Saves the content of the analysis window to a selected location

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.ClearToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Clears the analysis window

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.TextboxContentChange
member.summary: Signals to the program that the analysis window's content has change, making suitable changes to the undo and redo stack

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.UndoToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Undoes the previous change to the analysis window

member.name: M:RegressionAnalysisTool.AnalysisForm.RedoToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Redoes the previous undone change to the analysis window
